lines.name: Piper
lines.text: Forgive me, it's not often I run into other living things on this hike, let alone a Quingee.

lines.name: Piper
lines.text: What, uh, what brings you up the mountain? Or, are you lost?

lines.name: Piper
lines.text: Well, if you plan on doing this again you should come visit me at the Meteorological Institute, can give you a forecast for your future climbs.

lines.name: Piper
lines.text: Speaking of, I have to get back to my trip down, got to get back to work after all.
